subject: Horses
lead_paragraph: A subcommittee of the Kentucky Horse Racing Commission unanimously recommended a ban on anabolic steroids in horse racing. The recommendation closely mirrors the national model rule proposed by the Racing Medication and Testing Consortium.
snippet: A subcommittee of the Kentucky Horse Racing Commission unanimously recommended a ban on anabolic steroids in horse racing. The recommendation closely mirrors the national model rule proposed by the Racing Medication and Testing Consortium.
